name: Welcome to The Reception
description:
This was made by us during the summer break off UNI. This is our first playable version of the game, as we are returning to UNI soon we are unable to make big changes.

You're arriving at a hotel the night before a convention where you will show off your new robot 'G.R.E.G'.

Created by Jake Simons & Oliver Mota.

Notes:

We are aware of some issues
